trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Georgetown
There were no other sightings in Georgetown on or around March 10th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI go to my window and I look to the west; there's a light in between the trees. If you look at it with binoculars you can see different lights going clockwise around the UFO. The UFO sometimes stays stationary when I look at it, and I come back 40 minutes later and it is gone. The other night I watched it for quite some time, and it moves around. It will then, disappear. This occurs at least 3-4 times out of the week. I'd really appreciate if you could bring a camcorder or some kind of recording device when you come to talk to me, it would be best if you came at night. I have a a video on my surveillance camera that I have recorded of a UFO in the sky. You would have to come to my house to see the video, I have no other means to shows this video because it's on a VHS.
Summary: UFO flies up and down, maneuvers around and just disappears sometimes.
